junrar.unpack.ppm

Class Pointer

  • java.lang.Object
    • junrar.unpack.ppm.Pointer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FreqData, PPMContext, RarMemBlock, RarNode, State

    public abstract class Pointer
extends java.lang.Object
    Simulates Pointers on a single mem block as a byte[]
    Author:
    $LastChangedBy$
